page.title: 12SERVICES AT ULLEY CHURCH
page.content: { { }The congregation is comparatively small,usually about twenty people, out of a population of approximately two hundred and twenty.As the congregation is so small the parish has been incorperated with nearby Aston.As the church is so small the services held here are rather limited.Major festivals such as Christmas,Easter and Mothering Sunday are observed with a special Communion Service every Sunday at 9.00a.m.Family Service is held at the beginning of each month at 10.00a.m.Also an evening service is held every month. Approximately two christenings take place each year,many parents preferring to go to Aston.Hardly anybody has been buried here recently because of the fear of earth movement.
